## Required_packages_and_setup

This section installs and loads all required R packages to ensure reproducibility of the following workflow.

```{r}
# Required R packages(only once needed)
install.packages(c("readxl", "dplyr", "ggplot2", "lmtest", "car", "sandwich", "devtools", "orcutt", "nlme", "knitr", "lubridate", "here", "tidyr", "purrr", "FinTS", "forecast", "xgboost", "Matrix", "webshot2", "stringr", "zoo", "readr", "ggpubr", "lmtest", "gridExtra", "cowplot", "gtable"))

# Load the necessary libraries
library(readxl) 
library(dplyr) 
library(ggplot2) 
library(lmtest) 
library(car) 
library(sandwich) 
library(devtools) 
library(nlme) 
library(knitr) 
library(lubridate) 
library(here)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(forecast)
library(FinTS)
library(xgboost)
library(Matrix)
library(webshot2)
library(gt)
library(stringr)
library(zoo)
library(readr)
library(ggpubr)
library(gridExtra)
library(cowplot)
library(gtable)
```

```{r}
# ---- Install and load all required packages ----
required_packages <- c(
  "readxl", "dplyr", "ggplot2", "lmtest", "car", "sandwich", 
  "devtools", "nlme", "knitr", "lubridate", "here", "tidyr",
  "purrr", "FinTS", "forecast", "xgboost", "Matrix", "webshot2",
  "stringr", "zoo", "readr", "ggpubr", "gridExtra", "cowplot",
  "gtable", "gt", "grid", "tibble", "tseries", "showtext",
  "scales", "shapviz"
)

for (pkg in required_packages) {
  if (!require(pkg, character.only = TRUE)) {
    message(paste("ðŸ“¦ Installing:", pkg))
    install.packages(pkg, dependencies = TRUE)
  }
  library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)
}

message("âœ… All required packages have been installed and loaded successfully.")
```
